posts.content:
PAN DRACONIS, the drunken priest of Chauntea
 
This build is an old mine, but it was improvable and with the help of the mighty ECB builders (thanks Valerfor and WebShaman), it has been improved a lot.
It is less balanced and less powerful than the famous Order of Jorgumandr, but it is a bit more offensive and, I think, pretty new.
 
Backstory :
 
Pan is a parish priest of Chauntea. He's also one of the most famous winegrower of the realms, his wine is known as the "nectar of the gods". He's always "testing" his own production, and completly addict to the nectar. He’s a kind of Panurge, very truculent, good-natured, but a powerful warrior, especially when is drunk. He has the power of the dragon in his blood, and is able to bless his fangs and his claws with the divine power of Chauntea to protect his vines. As a dragon, his only treasures are the vines and the wines. He has especially developped such a powerful fighting draconic drunken style to protect his atonishing treasure. When he's drunk, he likes to bother the local peasants by scaring them in a kobold form or something scarier.
